PSCT.Base: You can only control 1 "Miracle Stone". All Spellcaster monsters you control gain 500 ATK/DEF for each "Fortune Fairy" monster you control with different names. Once per turn, when an attack is declared involving your "Fortune Fairy" monster: You can draw 1 card.
